title: Print, Design for Wall Niche with a Bed, 1745
title_raw: Design for Wall Niche with a Bed
medium: Etching and engraving on off-white laid paper
inscribed:
On plate, upper center: C. P. S.C.M.; upper right: 19me. Livre./T.; abov: Livre de decorations de Lambris inventées par F. de Cuvilliés premier Architecte de S.A.S.E. de Baviere.; lower center, in the image: Se vend à Paris chez le Sr. Poilly ruë St. Iacques à l'image S. Benoît, avec privilege du Roi, et chez l'Auteur.; lower right: Gravé par C.A. de Lespilliez./1

Captions identify the objects.
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux (D. 80 and 81)
dimensions:
Platemark: 35.8 x 22.8 cm (14 1/8 x 9 in.)
Sheet: 44 x 28.6 cm (17 5/16 x 11 1/4 in.)
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, Design for Wall Niche with a Bed, 1745. Etching and engraving on off-white laid paper. 
Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-285-106
